message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $130. What do you think?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion. I am willing to pay $100 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your perspective, but the value of this product to me is quite high.  How about we meet in the middle at $115?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I place on this product, I am willing to pay $110 for it.
